We're actually using our CRM data to segment our target audience based on their job function, industry, and company size. We're also using a marketing automation tool to help with personalization and customization of our email campaigns.

For social media, we're using a combination of organic and paid advertising to reach our target audience. We're creating content that's relevant to our audience and using hashtags to increase visibility. We're also using social media listening tools to track engagement and sentiment around our brand and the new product.

In terms of personalization, we're using data and analytics to tailor our messaging and creative assets to specific segments of our audience. For example, we're creating different email campaigns based on job function, so that our messaging is more relevant and resonates with each group.

We're also using A/B testing to optimize our campaigns and improve performance over time. By testing different subject lines, CTAs, and creative assets, we can determine what's working best and make data-driven optimization decisions.
